full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO SBYONG DMAR KHRID SHAR RTZE CHOS RJE LA GNANG BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,TSUL 'DI YANG MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN, GDAN PA CHEN PO DPAL SNAR THANG GI MKHAN CHEN, SHAR RJE RTZE CHOS RJE GRAGS PA DPAL 'BYOR BAS SNGA PHYIR NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, CHOS SMRA BA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, SA GA ZLA BA'I DKAR TSES BCOS LNGA'I NYIN, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIMS CHUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR SUG BRIS SU BYAS PA LAS, DANG POR 'DRI BA'I YI GE PA NI, RNAM DPYOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL LO, ,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
